title.rendered: Gulshan sponsoring the night run marathon

content.rendered:
Gulshan, recently sponsored The Night Run Marathon as their Housing Partner of the event. It was a fun-filled event in which the Gulshan Team took part as well.

Mr. Divam Kapoor, Director Gulshan’s kicked off the Night Run 2018, The Delhi Chapter at CWG.

The Night Run is running music festival – an ultimate blend of a music festival and a fun run. Just as dusk begins to fall, The Night Run will begin and will take participants through an experience filled with music, lights, lasers, and entertainment. Runners will cross the finish line into an epic main stage after-party featuring a top headliner DJ and live band performance.

Check out the Pictures below
